Time for a proper introduction. I am a literature teacher, mostly retired. I love reading, music, baking, nature & cats. I am learning to boost a lot, which includes my passion for a truly inclusive world, so lots of support for Black, Indigenous, LGBTQIA+, Women, Working Class, & other rights. I understand users who want Mastodon to be a quiet corner, but I am more concerned about what happens if we look the other way when people suffer.

An intrepid explorer, navigating the often hostile lands of consumerism, to find the least awful options among vast swathes of unsustainable products and services that we use on a daily basis.
Come with me on a journey of discovery, for #sustainable #green #eco-friendly choices in a landscape of green washed, carbon offset pitfalls.
As we know, there is no ethical consumption under capitalism, but we sure can try!

Good Afternoon everyone,

DEPHER stood for!
"Disabled and Elderly Plumbing and Heating Emergency Repair" - as we are now branching the company to more of a open plumbing service that helps more than the disabled and elderly we thought this was much needed as we received phonecalls and emails asking do we help this person or can we help this other person we want the company to stand for everybody that needs us, hence the new name

" Community Plumbing &Heating "

fields.name: Customers with disabilities.
fields.value: Low income and single parent families.

fields.name: Or the replacement of plumbing and heating appliances.
fields.value: Help towards the cost of repairs

fields.name: Low income = To remove debt and poverty and reduce the effects on anxiety, depression and families
fields.value: Terms and conditions apply

fields.name: To give independence to those in their own homes
fields.value: Elderly = remove the danger of home health dangers

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
